pageContent: Purpose: NCCN Guidelines® recommend annual prostate biopsies for men with low risk prostate cancer on active surveillance. We determined whether erectile function decreases with the number of biopsies experienced.

metaData.source:
Sexual potency preservation and quality of life after prostate brachytherapy and low-dose tadalafil
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/25255712/
